success.veryGood: Data matches very well with RENIEC

failed.similarButBelowThreshold: Data has similarities with RENIEC but does not reach the minimum threshold. Review recommended.
failed.significantDifferences: Data has significant differences with RENIEC. Review required.
failed.noMatch: Data does not match RENIEC. Manual verification required.

errors.unavailable: Could not query RENIEC or DNI not found. Will be marked for review.
errors.invalidDni: Invalid DNI: must have exactly 8 numeric digits
errors.notFound: No information found for this DNI in RENIEC

messages.dataObserved: This person's data has been marked for review due to discrepancies with RENIEC

logs.validationFailed: Person data does not match RENIEC
